sources.title: The Dance Contest (1934)
sources.description: Popeye and Olive compete as partners in a dance contest. Naturally, Bluto butts in. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-dance-contest-1934/

metadata.Plot: Popeye and Olive visit a dance hall, where a contest is in progress (though judge Wimpy seems far more interested in his hamburgers than the dancers). He dances terribly. Bluto cuts in, and Popeye sulks in a corner next to a convenient bowl of spinach. Popeye dances impressively; Bluto comes back and manhandles Olive.
metadata.Actors: William Costello, William Pennell, Mae Questel
